title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, list & pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, create, push, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline, history, syntax themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker-compose stacks, CI examples.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI for reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose examples: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD ROCm, and bundled WebUI services.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model; runs in Deno Deploy.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with OpenAI-compatible `/v1/chat/completions` endpoint.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, create, delete with Tokio.
